trans-unit.target: Niemiecki skrót v. OT oznacza górna pozycje silnika.
trans-unit.note: This segment should be grouped with the next segment.

trans-unit.source: OT signifies the top dead center position for an engine.
trans-unit.note: The previous segment should be grouped with this segment.
